root.name: Crysis 3
root.description: OverviewCrysis 3 is the fourth installment in the first-person shooter franchise, developed by Crytek and published by Electronic Arts. The game takes place 24 years after the events of Crysis 2 and it is set in a now forested New York City.The game was released on February 19, 2013, and is available for PC via Origin; as well as Xbox 360 and Playstation 3. Pre-Order BonusPre-orders for Crysis 3 will receive a free digital copy of the original Crysis port running on Crytek's new CryEngine 3 and an upgrade to Hunter Edition. The Hunter Edition includes Day 1 access to the Signature Composite Bow, early access to the Electric Arrow Attachment and Hunter Nanosuit Module, a unique bow camouflage skin, Level 5 XP boost for multiplayer and three exclusive dogtags.PC System RequirementsMinimumRecommendedHi-PerformanceOS: Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8GPU: DirectX 11 graphics card with 1Gb Video RAMCPU: Dual core CPURAM: 2GB Memory (3GB on Vista)Example 1 (Nvidia/Intel): Nvidia GTS 450/Intel Core2 Duo 2.4 Ghz (E6600)Example 2 (AMD): AMD Radeon HD5770/AMD Athlon64 X2 2.7 Ghz (5200+)OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8GPU: DirectX 11 graphics card with 1GB Video RAMCPU: Quad core CPURAM: 4GB MemoryExample 1 (Nvidia/Intel): Nvidia GTX 560/Intel Core i3-530Example 2 (AMD): AMD Radeon HD5870/AMD Phenom II X2 565OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8GPU: Latest DirectX 11 graphics cardCPU: Latest quad core CPURAM: 8GB MemoryExample 1 (Nvidia/Intel): NVidia GTX 680/Intel Core i7-2600kExample 2 (AMD): AMD Radeon HD7970/AMD Bulldozer FX4150
